metadata.title: CVE-2016-3954 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
web2py before 2.14.2 allows remote attackers to obtain thesession_cookie_key value via a direct request toexamples/simple_examples/status.  NOTE: this issue can be leveraged byremote attackers to execute arbitrary code using CVE-2016-3957.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3954` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-gluon - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
python-web2py - 2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: web2py package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.12.3-1ubuntu0.1').
